title: An Inch of Land | WAR DRAMA

sources.title: An Inch of Land | WAR DRAMA
sources.description:
Based on the story by G. Baklanov. The film is about one of the bridgeheads on the right bank of the Dniester river, defended by a small group of artillerymen in 1944. For several weeks, they heroically repel attacks by the German army, losing their best comrades in battle.

IMDb: 7.3

Year of production: 1964

Directors: Smirnov Andrey, Yashin Boris
Scriptwriter: Baklanov Grigory
Composer: Pirumov Alexander
Camera operator: Skhirtladze Yuri
Production designer: Chebotarev Boris

Cast: Alexander Titov, Evgeniy Urbansky, Alexander Zbruev, Sergey Kurilov, Elliya Sukhanova, Mikhail Vorontsov, Anatoly Golik, Lev Durov, Alexey Zaitsev, Alexander Petrov, Viktor Suskin, Oleg Forostenko, Leonid Chubarov
